insert into sea_co_filters (Name, rColumn, uesMode, sFind, sStart, sEnd, sReplace, Flag, cotype) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcolumn,jdbcType=BIT}, #{uesmode,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sfind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sstart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{send,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sreplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update sea_co_filters set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rColumn = #{rcolumn,jdbcType=BIT}, uesMode = #{uesmode,jdbcType=BIT}, sFind = #{sfind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sStart = #{sstart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sEnd = #{send,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sReplace = #{sreplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT}, cotype = #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, Name, rColumn, uesMode, sFind, sStart, sEnd, sReplace, Flag, cotype from sea_co_filters
